comments.text:
I see it. The main characters are Odysseus and his crew. These women are 
the sirens. The blind guy at the beginning is the Soothsayer (despite the 
absence of the Cetus). The part where George Clooney meets his wife is when 
the heroes almost make it back to Thebes. And of course the evil guy with 
the dogs is the mad god Poseidon.

comments.text:
You sir are well educated, but Sirens are water spirits, the were the 
daughters of the river god Achelous, but they do have the form of humans, 
and were given that form to keep seducing men to lure them to their death, 
and appear several times in Greek mythology, the human form is to show 
difference between Water nymphs, mermaids and Sirens. I thought I'd do in 
depth to explain what you said. Mythology is awesome and worth reading.
comments.author: Christion Simpson

comments.text:
Harpys are bird people, mermaids are fish people, and sirens are human 
people that have magical voices that entrap only men.
comments.author: Christopher Conley

comments.text:
sirens, mermaids, who cares. Sirens are known to lure sailors to their
